snippet: The Nationals will host the Cardinals on Wednesday more than 79 years after the last playoff game was held in Washington.
lead_paragraph: The Nationals will host the Cardinals on Wednesday more than 79 years after the last playoff game was held in Washington.

headline.seo: In Washington, Baseball as It Once Was
headline.main: In Washington, Baseball as It Once Was: in the Playoffs, and in the Daytime
headline.print_headline: In Washington, Baseball as It Once Was: in the Playoffs, and in the Daytime
